properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
En premageethamam
(You are my love song)
En Yeshunada nee
(my Jesus)
En jeevanekalum nee
(Even more than my life)
Valiyathaneniku
(you are bigger)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Aaradhana… aaradhana…
(I worship you)
Aaradhana… aaradhana…
(I worship you)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thullyam chollan aarumille
(There is none to compare)
Angepole Yeshuve
(... to you Jesus)
Jeevane swanthame ange marvil
( You are my life, you are my own, In your arms)
Charunnu njan
(I take my rest)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Angeppole snehichedaan
(To love like you do)
Aavathilla aarkume (2)
(That no one can do)
Snehame premame ange maarvil
(You are Agape, you are Love, in your arms)
Charunnu njan (2)
(I take my rest)
